method: In a bowl, toss the chopped cactus with olive oil, paprika, garlic powder, salt, pepper, and cornstarch until well coated.
Spread the coated cactus on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, flipping halfway through, until the cactus is crispy and golden brown.
Serve immediately as a side dish or a snack.
